item.title: Louvre workers vote to strike in another blow to the Paris museum
item.description: Workers at the Louvre Museum have voted to strike over working conditions and other complaints

item.title: Director Rob Reiner and wife Michele stabbed to death in Los Angeles home: Sources
item.description: The Los Angeles Police Department is investigating a murder at a home that property records show belongs to director Rob Reiner.

item.title: Person of interest in Brown University shooting being released without charges: Mayor
item.description: Brown University lifted its lockdown early on Sunday morning.

item.title: WATCH: United Airlines flight loses power during takeoff
item.description: One of the engines on a United Airlines plane failed as it lifted off, sparking a fire near the runway, officials said.

item.title: WATCH: Dick Van Dyke celebrates 100th birthday
item.description: Famed actor Dick Van Dyke is known for his sitcom back in the early 1960s and dazzling performance in "Mary Poppins."
